<!-- source-hash: 765d51f85882069e907a5ca1ca648e66 -->
A Spring component that maps between internal device domain objects and external API response DTOs, providing comprehensive transformation for device data including tags and filtering options.

## Key Components

- **toDeviceResponse()** - Maps Machine entity to DeviceResponse DTO with optional tags
- **toDevicesResponse()** - Maps paginated Machine query results to DevicesResponse
- **toDevicesResponseWithTags()** - Maps paginated results with associated tags per device
- **toDeviceFilterResponse()** - Transforms DeviceFilters to DeviceFilterResponse
- **toDeviceFilterOptions()** - Converts DeviceFilterCriteria to DeviceFilterOptions
- **toTagResponse()** - Maps Tag entity to TagResponse DTO
- **Filter mapping methods** - Convert filter options to response items

## Usage Example

```java
@Autowired
private DeviceMapper deviceMapper;

// Map single device with tags
Machine machine = deviceRepository.findById(deviceId);
List<Tag> deviceTags = tagRepository.findByDeviceId(deviceId);
DeviceResponse response = deviceMapper.toDeviceResponse(machine, deviceTags);

// Map paginated devices without tags
CountedGenericQueryResult<Machine> queryResult = deviceService.searchDevices(criteria);
DevicesResponse devicesResponse = deviceMapper.toDevicesResponse(queryResult);

// Map devices with per-device tags
List<List<Tag>> tagsPerDevice = getTagsForDevices(queryResult.getItems());
DevicesResponse enrichedResponse = deviceMapper.toDevicesResponseWithTags(queryResult, tagsPerDevice);

// Map filter criteria
DeviceFilterCriteria criteria = buildSearchCriteria();
DeviceFilterOptions options = deviceMapper.toDeviceFilterOptions(criteria);
```
